data.eml:eml: A new subgenus Wraseiellus of the genus Pterostichus Bonelli (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Pterostichini) and new species descriptions

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Hongliang, Sciaky, Riccardo, Liang, Hongbin, Zhou, Hongzhang (2013): A new subgenus Wraseiellus of the genus Pterostichus Bonelli (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Pterostichini) and new species descriptions. Zootaxa 3664 (2): 101-135, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3664.2.1
